website_summaries.verdict: While some will be wishing for a larger capacity, this easy to use candy melting pot ships with a ton of accessories.
pros: Has two temperature settings: 140°F for melting, 109°F for warming
Accessories include a spatula, draining rack, a variety of molds, and skewers and forks
Stores easily, and simple to use
Good for intimate parties of one or two people
cons: Some buyers felt that the 8.8-ounce capacity wasn’t large enough
